fi.left2die.gameobject
Class GameWorld

java.lang.Object
  fi.left2die.gameobject.Entity
      fi.left2die.gameobject.GameWorld
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameObject, Button.ButtonListener, RadioButtonBox.RadioButtonBoxListener, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
public class GameWorld
extends Entity
implements IGameObject, RadioButtonBox.RadioButtonBoxListener, Button.ButtonListener

This is class with holds most of left2die game play logic. It is entity like player, enemies and items.

Author:
TeeMuki
